articles.title: Recent Match Report - Karnataka vs Saurashtra 2nd semi final 2022/23 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Gowtham's three wickets had reduced Saurashtra to 42 for 5 in a chase of 115, before Vasavada and Sakariya rescued them
